rooms.description: Scandinavian-inspired entrance hall with clean lines and minimalistic design.
Open-plan living area that seamlessly connects with the dining space, featuring light wooden finishes and neutral tones.
Integrated dining area with Scandinavian design elements including a simple wooden table and seating.
Compact yet functional kitchen with energy-efficient appliances. Incorporates clean lines and a neutral color palette.
Functional ground-floor bathroom designed for convenience with Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.description: Entry door with a sliding glass feature for natural light.
Large window to enhance daylight and connect living area with outdoor space.
Window leading to a small balcony adjoining the kitchen.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Scandinavian aesthetics. Incorporates a private balcony for Vastu harmony.
Cozy bedroom with Scandinavian-inspired design, ensuring a calm and restful environment.
Modern bathroom with Scandinavian design elements emphasizing functionality and simplicity.

openings.description: Compact staircase connecting ground and upper floors with Scandinavian design cues.
Private balcony adjoining master bedroom for Vastu alignment and natural light.

rooftop_terrain.description: Rooftop terrace featuring Scandinavian design principles with minimalistic decking, ambient lighting, and an area for relaxation.
